shortdesc.ph: Starts pushing media streams to the CDN directly.

p.codeblock: public abstract int startDirectCdnStreaming(IDirectCdnStreamingEventHandler eventHandler, String publishUrl, DirectCdnStreamingMediaOptions options);
virtual int startDirectCdnStreaming(IDirectCdnStreamingEventHandler* eventHandler, const char* publishUrl, const DirectCdnStreamingMediaOptions& options) = 0;
public abstract int StartDirectCdnStreaming(string publishUrl, DirectCdnStreamingMediaOptions options);
Future<void> startDirectCdnStreaming( {required DirectCdnStreamingEventHandler eventHandler, required String publishUrl, required DirectCdnStreamingMediaOptions options});

section.p: Aogra does not support pushing streams to one URL repeatedly.

Agora does not support setting the value of publishCameraTrack and publishCustomVideoTrack as , or the value of publishMicrophoneTrack and publishCustomAudioTrack as at the same time. When choosing media setting options () you can refer to the following examples:
If you want to push audio and video streams published by the host to the CDN, the media setting options should be set as follows:
If you want to push external audio and video streams, ensure the following:

ul.li: publishCustomAudioTrack is set as and call the method.
publishCustomAudioTrack is set as and call the or method.
publishCustomVideoTrack is set as and call the method.

plentry.pd: The media setting options for the host. See .
